hipi.image
Class ImageHeader

java.lang.Object
  hipi.image.ImageHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<BinaryComparable>, RawComparator<BinaryComparable>, Writable
public class ImageHeader
extends Object
implements Writable, RawComparator<BinaryComparable>

The header information for a 2D image. ImageHeader encapsulates universally available information about a 2D image (width, height, and bit depth) along with variable EXIF metadata.

The hipi.image.io package provides classes for reading (decoding) and writing (encoding) ImageHeader objects in various image formats such as JPEG and PNG.

Method Detail

addEXIFInformation

public void addEXIFInformation(String key,
                               String value)
Adds an EXIF key/value pair to the ImageHeader object. The key corresponds to the "field name" in the EXIF 2.2 specification.

Parameters:
key - Key or "field name" of the EXIF record.
value - Value of the EXIF record.

getEXIFInformation

public String getEXIFInformation(String key)
Get EXIF value associated with key, if present.

Parameters:
key - Key or "field name" of the desired EXIF record.
Returns:
Value corresponding to key if present or the empty string if not.
See Also:
addEXIFInformation(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

readFields

public void readFields(DataInput input)
                throws IOException
Reads an ImageHeader stored in a simple uncompressed binary format. The first four bytes are the bit depth, width, and height, and count of EXIF records, followed by the EXIF key/value records stored as strings.

Specified by:
readFields in interface Writable
Parameters:
input - Interface for reading bytes from a binary stream.
Throws:
IOException

Specified by:

IOException
See Also:

set

public void set(ImageHeader header)
